column3: System should allow user to enter Username/Email
System should allow user to enter Password
System should redirect user to Home page.
System should display transaction inner menu.

column1: Mouse Over on Purchase Sub Module and Click on Purchase Order link
column3: Application should navigate to Purchase order screen.
Application should populate suppliers modal window with all available suppliers.

column1: Provide Input for Suppliers keyword to search Field
column3: System should allow user to enter Suppliers keyword to search
Should select preferred supplier to create purchase order.
Application should close suppliers details window.
Application should display Items modal window with all available items.

column1: Provide Input for Item search field Field
column3: System should allow user to enter Item search field
Should select preferred Item to create purchase order.

column1: Provide Input for Item Quantity Field
column3: System should allow user to enter Item Quantity
Should select populate MRP and Cost price of selected Item accordin to quantity entered.
Application should successfully create Purchase order with selected supplier and Items.
